Feats-Skill-Crafting -- Male Half-Elf Rogue: 2

Half-Elf: Has the Low-Light Vision feature
Human Heritage: 1 selection

Rogue Key Ability: 1 selection
Rogue's Racket: 1 selection
Skill Feats: 2 selections
Half-Elf: Has the elf trait and may take elf and half-elf feats
Low-Light Vision: Has normal vision in dim light
Perception: +7 (wisdom; expert)
Skill Modifiers:
Acrobatics: +2 (dexterity; untrained) Forest Lore: +6 (intelligence; trained) Performance: +2 (charisma; untrained)

Athletics: +2 (strength; untrained) Heraldry Lore: +6 (intelligence; trained) Scribing Lore: +6 (intelligence; trained)
Circus Lore: +6 (intelligence; trained) Intimidation: +2 (charisma; untrained) Society: +2 (intelligence; untrained)
Crafting: +10 (intelligence; master) Labor Lore: +6 (intelligence; trained) Stealth: +6 (dexterity; trained)

Languages: Abyssal; Common; Halfling; Shadowtongue
Skill Notes:
Alchemical Crafting: Knows the formulas for 4 common 1st-level alchemical items
Intelligence Language Bonus: +2 Language Count
Rogue Skills: Skill Trained (Stealth; Choose 9 from any)
Scoundrel: Skill Trained (Deception; Diplomacy)
Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 1 from any)
Alchemical Crafting: Can use Crafting to create alchemical items
Cooperative Nature: +4 Aid checks
Craft Anything: Can craft items without meeting secondary requirements
Formula Book: Has a book that contains at least 4 alchemical formulas
Impeccable Crafting: Successes on Specialty Crafting are critical successes
Inventor: Can use Crafting to create unknown common formulas
Magical Crafting: Can craft magic items/Knows the formulas for 4 common magic items of 2nd level or lower
Quick Repair: Can Repair an item in 3 actions
Snare Crafting: Can use Crafting to create snares and knows the formulas for 4 common snares
Specialty Crafting: +2 Crafting on selected type of item
Student Of The Canon: Critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Failures to Recall Knowledge about own faith are successes, and successes are critical successes
Trap Finder: +1 Armor Class vs. traps
Combat
Hit Points: 24 Armor Class: 16 (dexterity; trained) Class DC: Rogue: 16 (dexterity; trained)
Armor: None Shield: None
Combat Notes:
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +2
Strength Attack Adjustment: +2
Scoundrel: Successful Feint inflicts flat-footed on foe vs. self attacks, or all attacks on a critical success, until the end of the next turn
Sneak Attack: Successful strike using an agile, finesse, or ranged weapon vs. a flat-footed foe inflicts +1d6 HP precision damage
Surprise Attack: Rolling Deception or Stealth for initiative inflicts flat-footed on creatures that haven't acted
Trap Finder: Gives +1 Perception and automatic Searches to find traps and allows disabling traps that require master proficiency in Thievery
Save: Fortitude: +4 (constitution; trained); Reflex: +8 (dexterity; expert); Will: +7 (wisdom; expert)
Save Notes: Trap Finder: +1 vs. traps
Magic
Spell Slots: P0: 2 Attack: Primal: +6 (charisma; trained) Spell DC: Primal: 16 (charisma; trained)
Magic Notes:
Minor Magic (Primal): Spell Trained (Primal)
Minor Magic (Primal): Knows 2 primal cantrips
Notes
Validation Errors:
Craft Anything Feat: Requires level (currently 2) >= 15 and crafting rank (currently 3) >= 4
General And Skill Feat Allocation: 2 available vs. 8 allocated
Impeccable Crafting Feat: Requires level (currently 2) >= 7, crafting rank (currently 3) >= 3 and specialty crafting feature (currently 1)
Inventor Feat: Requires level (currently 2) >= 7 and crafting rank (currently 3) >= 3
